DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety orally administer single dose PSI-697 subject scleritis , model inflammatory disease . To evaluate vivo confocal microscopy ( IVCM ) effect single dose PSI-697 leukocyte roll scleral blood vessel subject scleritis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating PSI-697 Patients With Scleritis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Age 18 high ; A negative urine pregnancy test screen female subject ; Female subject must postmenopausal surgically sterile . Exclusion : Isolated episcleritis ; Isolated posterior scleritis ; Infectious scleritis .
